label.name: feature
label.value: Open a leave form using admin profile and submit a leave request

step.name: Then the user selected Annual Leave from the list item
step.title: Then the user selected Annual Leave from the list item

step.name: Then the user selected today and tomorrow as today and tomorrow respectively
step.title: Then the user selected today and tomorrow as today and tomorrow respectively

step.name: The date format is correct as DD/MM/YYYY in From Date field
